org.gtc.grade

Class Grader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gtc.grade.Grader

  • public class Grader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to compute a grade based on conformity rules and a basis test result.
    Author:
    Wagner Macedo

    • Method Detail

      • getGrade

        public GradeResult getGrade(java.lang.String name,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ClassWrapper> checkingClasses,
                   ClassWrapper[] assertionClasses)
        Compute the grade of a set of pre-compiled classes passed in arguments.
        Parameters:
        name - Identify this result. This is normally the student name or his or her enrollment number.
        checkingClasses - the student's java classes
        assertionClasses - the test classes that test checkingClasses
        Returns:
        a GradeResult object with grading data
